summary: This document details a complaint involving Jeffrey Epstein, who is reported to have threatened a victim by stating he would burn her painting and send her Polaroids of the burnt artwork. It notes that Epstein had keys to the victim's apartment, indicating a level of access and potential intimidation.

persons.name: Jeffery Epstein
persons.context: Jeffery Epstein is mentioned as the perpetrator who threatened a victim regarding her painting.

connections.description: Epstein is reported to have threatened the victim, indicating a direct perpetrator-victim relationship.

events.title: Threatening Communication
events.description: Epstein threatened to burn the victim's painting and send her Polaroids of the burnt painting.

keyFacts: Jeffery Epstein threatened a victim by stating he would burn her painting.
Epstein claimed he would send Polaroids of the burnt painting to the victim.
Epstein had keys to the victim's apartment, indicating potential access and intimidation.
